snippet: A group of software developers and designers, product managers and more have used their prowess to create apps and other tools to help the candidate.
abstract: Presidential campaign of Sen Bernie Sanders is drawing a geographically far-flung network of top technology professionals, who are volunteering to provide it with cutting-edge apps, websites, and other tools; highly-organized Sanders devotees include many who are new to politics and donated work, classified as in-kind contribution, saves campaign significant money.
lead_paragraph: A group of software developers and designers, product managers and more have used their prowess to create apps and other tools to help the candidate.

headline.main: Legion of Tech Volunteers Lead a Charge for Bernie Sanders
headline.print_headline: Sanders Attracts Tech-Savvy Talent That Would Cost Anybody Else
